languages.text: "На совете офицеров мы приняли решение увести корабль на Футфол. Туда стекаются слухи со всего Простора, и наши агенты без устали искали любую информацию о Вашей Светлости. Найди мы хотя бы намек на место, где вы томитесь, мы бы немедленно начали спасательную экспедицию".

"The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."
languages.original_text: "На совете офицеров мы приняли решение увести корабль на Футфол. Туда стекаются слухи со всего Простора, и наши агенты без устали искали любую информацию о Вашей Светлости. Найди мы хотя бы намек на место, где вы томитесь, мы бы немедленно начали спасательную экспедицию".

traits.locale_text: "At an officers' council, we decided to take the ship to Footfall. That world is the gossip hub of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for any information related to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we had even a hint of where you were imprisoned, we would have set off on a rescue expedition at once."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "At an officers' council, we decided to take the ship to Footfall. That world is the gossip hub of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for any information related to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we had even a hint of where you were imprisoned, we would have set off on a rescue expedition at once."

Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Los oficiales nos reunimos en consejo y decidimos llevar la nave a Paso, donde circulan rumores de toda la Extensión. Nuestros agentes buscaron sin descanso información sobre usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De haber oído el menor murmullo que nos indicase dónde {mf|lo tenían prisionero|la tenían prisionera}, habríamos organizado inmediatamente una expedición de rescate».
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: «Los oficiales nos reunimos en consejo y decidimos llevar la nave a Paso, donde circulan rumores de toda la Extensión. Nuestros agentes buscaron sin descanso información sobre usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De haber oído el menor murmullo que nos indicase dónde {mf|lo tenían prisionero|la tenían prisionera}, habríamos organizado inmediatamente una expedición de rescate».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “经过军官会议讨论，我们决定把船开到落脚港，因为那里可以打听到整个科罗努斯扩区的流言蜚语。我们的特工孜孜不倦地搜寻关于您的信息。要是那个时候，我们打听到哪怕一点关于你被囚禁在哪里的消息，我们一定会立即发起营救行动。”
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: “经过军官会议讨论，我们决定把船开到落脚港，因为那里可以打听到整个科罗努斯扩区的流言蜚语。我们的特工孜孜不倦地搜寻关于您的信息。要是那个时候，我们打听到哪怕一点关于你被囚禁在哪里的消息，我们一定会立即发起营救行动。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Le conseil des officiers a décidé de conduire le vaisseau à Castel, où convergent toutes les rumeurs des Étendues. Nos agents ont cherché sans relâche des informations à votre sujet, Votre Seigneurie. Si nous avions entendu ne serait-ce qu'un murmure indiquant où vous étiez {mf|détenu|détenue}, nous y aurions immédiatement envoyé une équipe de sauvetage. »
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: « Lors d'un conseil des officiers, nous avons décidé de conduire le vaisseau à Castel, où convergent toutes les rumeurs des Étendues. Nos agents ont cherché sans relâche des informations à votre sujet, Votre Seigneurie. Si nous avions entendu ne serait-ce qu'un murmure indiquant où vous étiez {mf|détenu|détenue}, nous y aurions immédiatement envoyé une équipe de sauvetage. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「士官会議では、エクスパンス全体の噂話が聞けるフットフォールに船を運ぶことにしました。我々のエージェントは不眠不休であなたに関する情報を探しました。あなたがどこに幽閉されているのか、ささやき声でも聞いていれば、ただちに救出作戦を開始したでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: 「士官会議では、エクスパンス全体の噂話が聞けるフットフォールに船を運ぶことにしました。我々のエージェントは不眠不休であなたに関する情報を探しました。あなたがどこに幽閉されているのか、ささやき声でも聞いていれば、ただちに救出作戦を開始したでしょう」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Der Offiziersrat hat entschieden, das Schiff nach Footfall zu bringen, wo man Gerüchte aus der gesamten Ausdehnung hört. Unsere Agenten haben unermüdlich nach Informationen über Euch gesucht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hätten wir auch nur das leiseste Flüstern gehört, wo Ihr gefangen gehalten werdet, hätten wir augenblicklich eine Rettungsexpedition organisiert."
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben bei einem Offiziersrat entschieden, das Schiff nach Footfall zu bringen, wo man Gerüchte aus der gesamten Ausdehnung hört. Unsere Agenten haben unermüdlich nach Informationen über Euch gesucht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hätten wir auch nur das leiseste Flüstern gehört, wo Ihr gefangen gehalten werdet, hätten wir augenblicklich eine Rettungsexpedition organisiert."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Subaylar konseyi, gemiyi Enginlik'teki tüm dedikoduları duyabileceğimiz Binliman'a götürmeye karar verdi. Ajanlarımız yorulmak nedir bilmeden {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında bilgi edinmeye çalıştı. Nerede olduğunuza dair tek bir kelime bile duysak anında kurtarma seferi tahsis edecektik."
languages.original_text: "The officers' council decided to take the ship to Footfall, where one can hear the gossip of the entire Expanse. Our agents tirelessly searched for information about Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Had we heard even a whisper of where you were imprisoned, we would have immediately launched a rescue expedition."

traits.locale_text: "Subay konseyi gemiyi Enginlik'teki tüm dedikoduları duyabileceğimiz Binliman'a götürmeye karar verdi. Ajanlarımız yorulmak nedir bilmeden {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında bilgi edinmeye çalıştı. Nerede olduğunuza dair tek bir kelime bile duymuş olsak anında kurtarma seferi tahsis ederdik."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
